mapper.insert: insert into crew_board (crew_num, board_num, email, name, board_subject, board_content, board_created, hitcount, notice) values (#{crew_num}, #{board_num}, #{email}, #{name}, #{board_subject}, #{board_content}, sysdate, 0, #{notice})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from crew_board where crew_num = #{crew_num} and ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select board_num,name,email,board_subject,board_content, hitCount,board_created from crew_board where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.update: update crew_board set hitCount=hitCount+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
